title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Pats should pursue Texans' tampering; No "new" Kirk Cousins; Earl Thomas' Seattle shade
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Pats should pursue Texans' tampering; No "new" Kirk Cousins; Earl Thomas' Seattle shade
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff looks at Belichick and the Patriots pursuing tampering charges against the Texans over contact with Nick Cesario for their GM position, why Kirk Cousins will always be limited despite Vikings changes to the offense, and why Earl Thomas' comments on the simplicity of the Seahawks D aren't as bad as they appear.  Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
